siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: GPU.LAND offers GPU instances for Deep Learning — at dirt-cheap prices. How cheap? Up to 80% cheaper vs major cloud providers. We believe everyone, and not just "Big Tech", should be able to train AI models. So we built the cheapest place on the web to do it.
blogPost.body: GPU.LAND offers GPU instances for Deep Learning — at dirt-cheap prices. How cheap? Up to 80% cheaper vs major cloud providers. We believe everyone, and not just "Big Tech", should be able to train AI models. So we built the cheapest place on the web to do it.
blogPost.title: GPU.LAND - Affordable cloud GPUs for deep learning
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: GPU.LAND为深度学习提供GPU实例--价格很便宜。有多便宜？与主要的云供应商相比，便宜了80%。我们相信每个人，而不仅仅是 "大科技"，都应该能够训练AI模型。因此，我们建立了网络上最便宜的地方来做这件事。
localize.tagline: 用于深度学习的平价云GPU

localize.description: GPU.LAND爲深度學習提供GPU實例--價格很便宜。有多便宜？與主要的雲供應商相比，便宜了80%。我們相信每個人，而不僅僅是 "大科技"，都應該能夠訓練AI模型。因此，我們建立了網絡上最便宜的地方來做這件事。
localize.tagline: 用於深度學習的平價雲GPU

previous.excerpt: Can't find the right words to start a conversation? We have used GPT-3 to generate dozens of thousands of Tinder openers and picked the best of them (according to our limited experience).
previous.title: +500 Openers for Tinder written by GPT-3 - GPT-3 generated thousands of openers & we picked the best

localize.description: 找不到合适的开场白？我们使用GPT-3生成了数万条Tinder开场白，并从中挑选出最好的开场白（根据我们有限的经验）。
localize.tagline: GPT-3产生了数以千计的打开器，我们挑选了最好的打开器。

localize.description: 找不到合適的開場白？我們使用GPT-3生成了數萬條Tinder開場白，並從中挑選出最好的開場白（根據我們有限的經驗）。
localize.tagline: GPT-3產生了數以千計的打開器，我們挑選了最好的打開器。

next.excerpt: Stike allows you to use your Debit Card, Credit Card or Bank account to instantly send and receive funds with 0 fees using the Bitcoin Lightning network to transmit payments. Users can also send to regular Bitcoin addresses as well.
next.title: Strike - Send money instantly, with no fees, anywhere in the world

localize.description: Stike允许您使用您的借记卡、信用卡或银行账户以0费用使用比特币闪电网络即时发送和接收资金，传输支付。用户也可以向普通的比特币地址发送。
localize.tagline: 在世界任何地方即时汇款，不收取任何费用。

localize.description: Stike允許您使用您的借記卡、信用卡或銀行賬戶以0費用使用比特幣閃電網絡即時發送和接收資金，傳輸支付。用戶也可以向普通的比特幣地址發送。
localize.tagline: 在世界任何地方即時匯款，不收取任何費用。
